TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Picker extends Microsoft.Maui.Controls.View implements class Microsoft.Maui.Controls.IElementConfiguration`1<class Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker>, class Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Internals.IFontElement
type Picker = class inherit View interface IFontElement interface IElementConfiguration<Picker>

Docs.summary: A control for picking an element in a list.

remarks.para: The visual representation of a Picker is similar to a , but a picker control appears in place of a keyboard.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the border color.
Docs.remarks: This property allows you to customize the color of the picker border. On Android, when BorderThickness is not set, this affects the underline color.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the border thickness.
Docs.remarks: This property allows you to specify different thickness values for each side of the border (Left, Top, Right, Bottom). Default value is 0.

member this.ItemDisplayBinding : Microsoft.Maui.Controls.BindingBase with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a binding that selects the property that will be displayed for each object in the list of items.
Gets the list of choices.
Docs.value: An IList<string> representing the Picker choices.
Docs.remarks: This property is read-only, but exposes the IList<> interface, so items can be added using Add().

MemberSignature.Value: member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the index of the selected item of the picker. This is a bindable property.
Docs.value: An 0-based index representing the selected item in the list. Default is -1.
Docs.remarks: A value of -1 represents no item selected.

Docs.summary: Raised when the value of the SelectIndex property has changed.
